hero.title: Computer engineer
hero.description1: I was born in 2001 in Mallorca, Spain. Graduated in Computer Engineering and specialized in Artificial Intelligence.
quick-hobbies-description: 🏀 All kinds of sports, especially basketball.
📚 Reading all sorts of popular science and educational content.
